SEARCH
Package Utils.Image

Class SplitImage

java.lang.Object
Utils.Image.SplitImage
public class SplitImage extends Object
Represents a segment of an image, typically used when an image is divided into smaller parts for processing or transmission. This class captures a portion of an image along with its designated column and line position, facilitating the handling and reassembly of image parts.

The SplitImage class is particularly useful in scenarios where large images need to be processed in smaller segments to optimize for performance or to comply with server upload constraints. Each instance of this class represents a single segment of a larger image, including metadata about its position (column and line number) within the original image, as well as the image data itself.

This approach allows for efficient parallel processing of image segments or their sequential transmission to a server, where they can be reassembled or processed individually as needed.

  • Constructor Details

    • SplitImage

      public SplitImage(short columnNumber, short lineNumber, BufferedImage image)
      Constructs a new SplitImage and saving the line and column position of the image segment with lineNumber and columnNumber.
      Parameters:
      columnNumber - The column number of this image segment within the larger image. This helps identify its position for reassembly.
      lineNumber - The line number of this image segment within the larger image, further assisting in its correct placement upon reassembly.
      image - The BufferedImage containing the image segment data.

  • Method Details

    • getColumnNumber

      public short getColumnNumber()
      Returns the column number of this image segment.
      Returns:
      The column number indicating the segment's horizontal position in the original image.

    • getLineNumber

      public short getLineNumber()
      Returns the line number of this image segment.
      Returns:
      The line number indicating the segment's vertical position in the original image.

    • getImage

      public BufferedImage getImage()
      Returns the BufferedImage object containing the data for this image segment.
      Returns:
      The BufferedImage representing this segment of the image.
